name: trackingfieldGet
description:
[Tracking fields](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115000293426-Scheduling-Tracking-Fields) allow you to analyze usage by various fields within an organization.

When scheduling a meeting, the tracking field will be included in the meeting options.
Use this API to get information on a tracking field.

**Scopes:** `trackingfield:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
**Prerequisites:** * Business, Education, API or higher plan

$ul: **field**: Label/ Name for the tracking field.
